    About Me
    Achievement
    Winner of Job Matching Hackathon at JICA (2023)
    Team Bigbang
    Education
    Final year of Economics
    Yangon Economics University
    Hey there! I'm a budding full-stack developer with a knack for collaborative projects and a passion for learning. While I may lack formal job experience, I added my hardwork to a winning team in a Job Matching Hackathon, developing an ERP system for Flavor Wave in just 7 days. Additionally, I contributed to a two-month project creating a web-based Yawgi Management System for Punnyarama Monastery. I thrive on challenges and am eager to continue growing in the world of technology. Let's connect and create something extraordinary together!
